scripts.build-nocolor: npm run concat:css && cross-env NODE_DISABLE_COLORS=1 npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.concat:css: cat public/css/code.css public/css/plyr.css public/css/scangov.css public/assets/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.css public/assets/font-awesome/css/all.css > scripts/bundle.css
scripts.start: npm run concat:css && node scripts/getcomponents.js && npx @11ty/eleventy --serve --quiet
scripts.debug: npm run concat:css && cross-env DEBUG=Eleventy* npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.debugstart: npm run concat:css && cross-env DEBUG=Eleventy* npx @11ty/eleventy --serve --quiet
